item.title: Prisma error when doing upsert
item.description: When implementing upsert through Prisma you need to make sure that the where clause contains a unique column only. Here is an example on how to do an upsert in Prisma const upsertUser = await prisma.user.upsert({ where: { email: 'viola@prisma.io', }, update: { name: 'Viola the Magnificent', }, create: { email: 'viola@prisma.io', name: 'Viola the Magnificent', }, }) In where clause, we include the column that we want to check on database, is it exists or not.
